title: Return of the Watchlist
outcome: Three days after the partition leaks, 'disappeared' citizens return to Stenograd, holding hidden BCI codes and stories of secret detention. Their testimonies expose factional abuses and hidden truths about Halden’s final days. As they reintegrate, citywide councils must decide whether to trust the returnees or treat them as threats, escalating the crisis. The chapter climaxes with the revelation that their codes can either permanently unify or irreversibly fragment the BCI.

events.description: Groups of once-disappeared citizens emerge in central districts, their physical and mental scars stirring public debate about justice and reintegration.
Returning citizens share hidden BCI subroutines and logs to free zone councils, revealing evidence of orders issued directly before Halden’s death and exposing abuses by multiple Council factions.
Oksana convenes a closed emergency session—some council members want to use the returnees’ codes to instantly unify BCI, others fear new risks and advocate a complete shutdown.
A broadcast assembly pits returnee leaders against council delegates; the city is split: some cheer for unity, others for total rupture.
Consensus collapses over the fate of the BCI system when returnee codes are publicly demonstrated—halting scores citywide for hours and forcing everyone to confront the cost of truth.
